title: Yoshinobu Tohara, the chief of the Zengakuren financial department , confessed receiving millions of yen Prom Seigen Tanaka , a professional spy and provocateur . The Zengakuren Trotskiyists tried to turn the spearhead of the antitreaty struggle from U.S. imperialism and the Japanese monopoly capitalists to the Kishi regime alone . Seigen Tanaka was affiliated with the Japan Communist Party before the war , and organized the so - called armed May Day rally of 1930
